definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
lit. Yelang thinks highly of itself (idiom)/fig. foolish conceit
to think of oneself as terrific (idiom); arrogant

sentences.english: His mother railed at him for his haughtiness.
sentences.chinese: 他的母親由於他的驕傲自大而責備他。

sentences.english: And I'm worried about e-mail! Talk about pricking my pomposity.
sentences.chinese: 用電子郵件不行嗎，談論一下對我自大的打擊。
他是一個自高自大的人。

sentences.english: The business world is full of examples of hubris taking over.
sentences.chinese: 企業界到處都是自大狂掌管一切的例子。

sentences.english: Don't go getting so uppity even if you is the last chicken in Atlanta.
sentences.chinese: 不要那麼自大，就算你是亞特蘭的最後一隻雞。

sentences.english: Oh great, she probably thinks I'm stuck-up.
sentences.chinese: 哎呀，她很可能認爲我是個狂傲自大的傢伙。

sentences.english: Kid's extremely conceited arrogance is for covering up oneself's heart of flabbiness .
sentences.chinese: 孩子狂妄自大是爲了掩蓋自己內心的軟弱。

sentences.english: Too often, we honor swagger and bluster and the wielders of force.
sentences.chinese: 我們往往予以認同崇尚暴力和狂妄自大的人。

sentences.english: This fable criticizes those ignorant and arrogant people.
sentences.chinese: 這則寓言諷刺了那些孤陋寡聞，又盲目自大的人。

sentences.english: They were pround, conceited fellows, and they very soon began to try to make Columbus uncomfortable.
sentences.chinese: 他們全是傲慢自大的人，很快就使哥倫布感到不快。

sentences.english: Doesn't your great pride fear the gods any longer?
sentences.chinese: 你已經傲慢自大到連神都不敬了嗎？

sentences.english: I think that the way you said is a little highfalutin.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得你說話的口氣有一點自大。

sentences.english: Nor are the boys in the famous maroon-and-blue stripes arrogant or conceited.
sentences.chinese: 這些穿著名的紅藍球衣的男孩們也沒有驕傲或自大。

sentences.english: Look like some stuck-up rich folks.
sentences.chinese: 看起來是一些自大的富人。

sentences.english: Marian is such an egotist that she talks about herself all the time.
sentences.chinese: 瑪利安是個自大者，她總是談論着自己。

sentences.english: Xiao Ying is very conceited, so everyone dislikes her.
sentences.chinese: 小英很自大，所以人人都討厭她。

definition: to believe oneself infallible (idiom)/to be opinionated
to think of oneself as terrific (idiom); arrogant
the eye can see nothing worthwhile all around (idiom); arrogant/condescending/supercilious
to consider everyone else beneath one (idiom); so arrogant that no-one else matters/condescending/to go about with one's nose in the air
to think too much of oneself/self-important/arrogant
to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
lit. Yelang thinks highly of itself (idiom)/fig. foolish conceit
